timeline.content: Hey Afla, thanks for checking in. Looks like I was allocated a place in the halls managed by my uni after all, so I'll be probably sticking with that. I really appreciate your support and the information you shared. If anything changes, I'll be in touch.

transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker B: Hello.
Speaker A: Hello.
Speaker B: Hello.
Speaker A: Hello. Hi, is this Samuel?
Speaker B: Yes, this is Samuel.
Speaker A: Hi, Samuel. This is Afra from Ambi Student. How are you doing?
Speaker B: I'm doing fine, thank you.
Speaker A: Just wanted to check in with you regarding your inquiry that you had placed on our website yesterday about Camden, Holly Crescent, London.
Speaker B: About. Yes. Yes.
Speaker A: Would you like to proceed with the booking for that?
Speaker B: Not yet. Sorry, I'm on the road. I been looking through the rooms yesterday and I've not decided yet.
Speaker A: Okay. And when should I check with you? When would you have made a decision?
Speaker B: If I do make a decision, I'll definitely write you an email.
Speaker A: Okay. I also dropped your text on WhatsApp. Did you receive my text?
Speaker B: I think I saw a text, yes.
Speaker A: Okay. So if at all you decide to move forward with the booking, or if you'd like to explore any other options, or I have any questions, you can drop me a text on WhatsApp, give me a call, write me an email, whatever is convenient to you.
Speaker B: Okay? Sure. Yes. Thank you.
Speaker A: All right, thank you. Bye. Bye.
Speaker B: Bye.
